artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
description: bust portrait of woman in profile wearing blue and white plaid kimono, hanging a paper lantern with blue flowers
inscription: 昭和五年庚午夏 {Shōwa gonen kanoeuma natsu} (Summer 1930)
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | publisher seal: ワタナベ {Watanabe} | on back, red seal: 貮百五拾枚絶版　第貮百四拾九番 {nihyakugojū mai zeppan, dai nihyakuyonjūkyū ban} (edition of 250, number 249) | red square publisher seal: わたなべ {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From The First Collection of Modern Beauties (Gendai bijin shū dai isshū 現代美人集第一輯)
title: Gifu-style Paper Lantern
